name: A Simple Cube
description:
A game about a simple cube.

You play a cube who can roll and has a reduced field of view, during your progression you will discover new skills such as a jump, or a dimensional clone. Have fun!

Controls :

  • WASD: Roll your cube
  • AE: Rotate your cube
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift: Dimensional Clone
  • Tab: Switch Dimensional Clone
